LevelUp() LevelUpgame.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategy game.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategyLevelUp
void game.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategy.LevelUp ( )[inline]
Increases the level of the character or entity by one.
This method is responsible for leveling up the character or entity within the game or application. When called, it increments the internal level counter (_level) by one, allowing the character or entity to progress to the next level. This is typically used in role-playing games (RPGs) or similar applications where characters gain experience and level up over time. Note that this method does not perform any checks on the maximum level or any other conditions that might be required for leveling up.
ResetLevel() ResetLevelgame.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategy game.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategyResetLevel
void game.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategy.ResetLevel ( )[inline]
Resets the game level to the initial state.
This method sets the private field _level to 1, effectively restarting the game level. It is typically called when a player chooses to restart the game or after completing a level. This operation does not return any value and modifies the internal state of the game.

void game.logic.LevelBasedGravityStrategy.SetLevel (int level)[inline]
Sets the level to the specified value.
Parameters
level
The level to be set.
This method updates the private field _level with the value provided as the parameter level . It allows for changing the state of the object by modifying its level attribute. This method does not perform any validation on the input value, so it is assumed that the caller will provide a valid level.
